title: Embroidered panels
medium:
Medium: silk, pearl, wood
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, couching and looping stitches on 4/1 satin foundation
description: Three raised work panels for a casket worked on the same piece of foundation cloth.  Frieze at top; dog chasing a rabbit.  Panel at left; Hagar and Ishmael and Ishmael with the angel.  Panel at right; Abraham with Sarah and Isaac in the tent.
name: Embroidered panels
